ComicInfo.Title: Rust Never Sleeps; The Pandora Effect; Tilotny Throws a Shape
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rust Never Sleeps: R2 and C-3PO come to Ronyards, where old droids are dumped, to try and get the surviving droids to stand against the Empire when they send forces to mine the metal.
The Pandora Effect: Han, Leia and Chewbacca get caught in a multi-dimensional warship owned by worshippers of evil.
Tilotny Throws a Shape: Leia is being chased on a world where some godlike beings have appeared.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-01 07:33:49. [CVDB125913] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 21:45:31. [Issue ID 291800]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Adolfo Buylla,Alan Davis,John Stokes,Alan Davis,Adolfo Buylla,John Stokes
ComicInfo.Inker: Adolfo Buylla,Alan Davis,John Stokes,Alan Davis,Adolfo Buylla,John Stokes
